name: Vertical Shooter
description:
Description

This game was developped by some students during a training. It uses the Python arcade' game library.

The goal is to control a spaceship trying to survive in the deep space. Just move the ship to avoid enemy missiles. Try also to aboid collisions with enemy spaceships. You will lose one life point for each collision. If you reach zero life point, the game is over.

Try to go as far as you can !

Controls

Just move the ship using the analog gamepad stick.

You can press any button to shoot lasers in front of your spaceship. Press the analog trigger of your gamepad to launch a missile. Use the right analog stick to change missile orientation. 2 analog sticks + 2 buttons will make you increase your gamepad skills ! Hold On !
